c74object.name: av.follow~
c74object.description:
A more sophisticated envelope follower using 2 amp~'s in parallel. One quick envelope follower and one slow envelope follower subtracted from the fast one to filter out the low frequency changes. Also includes a low and high cutoff filter to focus the spectrum to follow the amplitude from.
Send a bang to get the floating value (control for example with the render bang from jit.world)

objarg.name: slow-attack-release
objarg.digest: Attack and release time of slow follower in milliseconds (default = 500)
objarg.description: Attack and release time of slow follower in milliseconds (default = 500)

method.name: bang
method.digest: Report the sample value with the renderbang
method.description: Report the sample value with the renderbang

method.name: float
method.description:
Function depends on inlet.
Inlet 1: none
Inlet 2: Set the attack time in milliseconds
Inlet 3: Set the release time in milliseconds

method.name: int
method.description:
Function depends on inlet.
Inlet 1: none
Inlet 2: Set the attack time in milliseconds
Inlet 3: Set the release time in milliseconds

attribute.name: cutoffs

attribute.description: Cutoffs frequencies for low and highcut filters in Hz (default = 20 18000)
